CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 21, 1958, page A16, reads: "Surprise! - Edward Townes surprised his charming wife, Notre Dame, on their anniversary, June 14, by giving a dinner party at the Greene Hearth in her honor. Guests were Mr. and Mrs. Morris Townes, Mr. and Mrs. Guy Kemp Jr., Miss Josephine Townes and Mr. and Mrs. Howard Alexander. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, including Edward Townes and Norte Dame Townes in center, and Morris Townes, Mrs. Townes, Mrs. Kemp, Guy Kemp Jr., Josephine Townes, Mrs. Alexander, and Howard Alexander gathered behind table with flowers for anniversary celebration in Greene Hearth, another version
